document.full_text: president jacob zuma of south africa received a raucous red carpet greeting on monday as he arrived in libya for meetings with col. muammar el-qaddafi.
document.title: qaddafi and zuma meet but reach no agreement
lines_and_colors: president jacob zuma of south africa received a raucous red carpet greeting on monday as he arrived in libya for meetings with col. muammar el-qaddafi.
